gdpr_deletion_requested.subject: Confirmation of your account deletion request
gdpr_deletion_requested.preview: Your account will be deleted in 30 days
gdpr_deletion_requested.title: Deletion Request Registered
gdpr_deletion_requested.intro: We have received your account deletion request. In accordance with our GDPR procedures, your account will be permanently deleted on {scheduledDate}.
gdpr_deletion_requested.warning_text: This action is irreversible. Once the deletion is completed, all your data will be permanently erased, including:
gdpr_deletion_requested.data_audios: All your audio files and transcriptions
gdpr_deletion_requested.cancel_intro: Changed your mind? You can cancel this request at any time before {scheduledDate}.
gdpr_deletion_requested.footer: If you did not initiate this request, please cancel immediately and contact our support.

gdpr_deletion_reminder.subject: Reminder: Your account will be deleted in {daysRemaining} day(s)
gdpr_deletion_reminder.preview: Your account will be deleted on {scheduledDate}
gdpr_deletion_reminder.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Account Deletion Reminder
gdpr_deletion_reminder.intro: We remind you that your account will be permanently deleted on {scheduledDate}, in {daysRemaining} day(s).
gdpr_deletion_reminder.reminder_text: After this date, all your data will be permanently erased and cannot be recovered.
gdpr_deletion_reminder.cancel_intro: If you wish to keep your account, you can cancel this request by clicking the button below.
gdpr_deletion_reminder.footer: This email is sent automatically as part of our account deletion process.

gdpr_deletion_completed.subject: Your account has been deleted
gdpr_deletion_completed.title: Account Deletion Completed
gdpr_deletion_completed.intro: In accordance with your request and GDPR regulations, your account and all your personal data have been permanently deleted from our systems.
gdpr_deletion_completed.thanks: Thank you for using our services.
gdpr_deletion_completed.reregister: If you wish to use our services again in the future, you are welcome to create a new account.
gdpr_deletion_completed.footer: This email is the final confirmation of your account deletion.
